testcase.name: should render development login interface correctly
should display all mock users with correct roles
testcase.failure:

Development Login
Select a user to simulate login in development mode. This page is only available in development.
Development Only: This interface allows you to quickly switch between different user roles for testing. Uses real authentication tokens that work with all API endpoints.

Loading users...

Instructions:

  • • User list is loaded dynamically from the database
  • • Click any user card to simulate login as that user
  • • Uses real authentication tokens that work with all API endpoints
  • • You'll be automatically redirected to the main page
  • • This interface is only available in development mode
  • • Use different roles to test various permission levels
  • • Click "Refresh Users" to reload the user list from database
  • • Test users are automatically created during database initialization
